amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute consists of the text of the "American Bald Eagle Recovery and National Emblem Commemorative Coin Act".
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. LaTourette.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaTourette amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
